600.11 - Recycled Pavement and subgrade improvement layer.
Acceptance Criteria - Backfill in 160mm-250mm layers Proof roll and Clegg Test. CIV≥15

Comments - Use AP40 hard fill or recycled pavement if available. We propose to use proof roll and clegg testing instead of NDM testing because of the variability of the recycled material and the bitumen content in it making it hard to test. This supersedes clause 22.2.1 in the project Specification.
600.1 - Recycled Pavement and subgrade improvement layer.

Minimum Test Frequency - Mat Samples Weighed every 400m2

Acceptance Criteria - Subbase to be stabalised with 3% cement. Keep record of tonnage of stabilisation agent used per area +/- 0.5kg/m2 of specified rate (16.5kg/m2) 250mm thick with a tolerance of -0mm / +20mm

Acceptance Criteria - Plateau test to determine NDM target. NDM testing, Mean ≥ 90% MDD, Min ≥ 85%, Total voids ≤ 20% Direct Transmission NDMs to be completed in same frequency as above. Tests to be completed at 50mm depth increments starting at 200mm depth.

Acceptance Criteria - Air and Surface temperature check prior to paving, 5˚c for structural and intermediate layers.

Acceptance Criteria - Thickness, Spreading & Trimming, Joints & Rolling Pattern.Compacted thickness of 135mm paved in two lifts each ≥70mm thick Primary Compaction achieved with 8T HAMM Oscillation Roller, Secondary Compaction achieved with 4T HAMM Oscillation Roller, Finishing Rolling with 4T Roller Determine optimum rolling pattern and number of passes to achieve air voids < 6% (target 4%) Measured surface temp shall be 100-175 deg C during compaction
